column4: I see the line "savedefault" under the line "root (hd0,1) which is right under the WinXP line
Good, then all you have to do is edit the line in the beginning of the file to say default saved (or saved, I can't remember) in the beginning of the file
First of all, as he was saying, you have to be careful that savedefault is set under Windows XP. Pastebin your menu.lst and we'll be able to help you better.
Gnome is generally considered Ubuntu's "native" environment. I personally hate K.
